subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon started from the back of the field in Nascar’s first road race of the Nextel Cup season after his team was penalized for a technical violation. This time, he will start from the pole. Rain at Watkins Glen International became too heavy by midafternoon and forced Nascar to cancel qualifying for tomorrow’s Centurion Boats at The Glen. Qualifying has been rained out three times in the past four years at Watkins Glen. The top 35 cars in the 43-car field were set by points, so the points leader, Gordon, was placed up front.
